statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_budget ASC
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_budget DESC
SELECT AVG(total_budget) AS average_budget FROM marketing_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT MAX(total_budget) AS highest_budget, MIN(total_budget) AS lowest_budget FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate), SUM(revenue) FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate, revenue FROM campaign_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Winter%';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM campaign_results GROUP BY campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate, revenue FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_results ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_results.campaign_id WHERE conversion_rate > 0.1 AND revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT conversion_id, campaign_id, conversion_date FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_value > 100;
SELECT click_id, click_date, device_type FROM ad_clicks ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(conversion_id) AS total_conversions FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(click_id) as total_clicks FROM ad_clicks WHERE campaign_id = 1001 AND device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT conversion_id, campaign_id, conversion_date, conversion_value FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_type = 'purchase';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(click_id) as total_clicks FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_clicks > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(action_id) AS total_actions FROM UserActions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 10;
SELECT campaign_id, user_id, conversion, revenue FROM CampaignResults WHERE conversion = TRUE ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, country FROM Users WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserActions WHERE action_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM Campaigns c JOIN CampaignResults r ON c.campaign_id = r.campaign_id WHERE revenue > 100 GROUP BY campaign_name;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS total_conversions, SUM(r.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM Users u JOIN CampaignResults r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.conversion = TRUE GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT group_id, group_name, segment_name FROM test_groups JOIN audience_segments ON test_groups.segment_id = audience_segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT campaign_name, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_metrics JOIN marketing_campaigns ON campaign_metrics.campaign_id = marketing_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE impressions > 1000 AND conversions > 50
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY segment_description ASC
SELECT group_name, value FROM test_results JOIN test_groups ON test_results.group_id = test_groups.group_id WHERE value > 0.5
